text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haa… Finished all ten.
choice_data_list: Good work finishing the morning training menu

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …too easy, I can keep goin'. I'm gonna go do 10 more.
choice_data_list: But, there's still the afternoon…

text_block_list.text: We're entering the high point of the summer training camp, so she's probably building up some fatigue. The blazing sun on the beach should be compounding that.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: All th' more reason ta push myself ta th' limit! Isn't this th' best chance ta train my endurance?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I wanna be thorough today…!
choice_data_list: Slowly increasing it one at a time is fine
Slowly increasing it one at a time is fine

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Okay, tha's fine! Alright, here I go!
Tamamo Cross was really motivated. Though it was unplanned, I added more to her afternoon training menu since she wanted to train harder.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, there she is. Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hey, wanna go ta the nearby summer festival? Not like ya got anything better ta do, right?
choice_data_list: Sure

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ya see, I was thinkin' 'bout tryin' out this rewardin' yerself thing…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: 'Cuz I worked really hard on today's trainin', right? It was two days worth of trainin'. So…
choice_data_list: Sounds like you deserve a reward!
Sounds like you deserve a reward!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: R-right…! Since Trainer says so, I'll try givin' myself a reward!!
choice_data_list: What kind of reward?
What kind of reward?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Walkin' 'round and tryin' all th' food stalls! I've wanted ta do somethin' like this since I was a kid. Tonight I'm gonna splurge an' hit all the' stalls!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What should I eat first~!? It's so hard ta decide!

text_block_list.name: Stall Manager
text_block_list.text: C'mon, welcome! Choco-bananas! Tonight as a special service, if you beat me in Rock-Paper-Scissors, you'll get one more free!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Choco-bananas~! They look good but, thinkin' 'bout how fillin' they might be, maybe I should pass fer now…
choice_data_list: Weren't we going to eat and walk around?
Weren't we going to eat and walk around?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah… tha's true… But… Choco-banana… are those a good thing ta buy fer that…?
choice_data_list: Can you buy one in my place?
Can you buy one in my place?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hm? Ah, Trainer, yer bad at Rock-Paper-Scissors, ain't ya~? Got it, I'll get one for ya!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Old man, one choco-banana!

text_block_list.name: Stall Manager
text_block_list.text: Here ya go! Alright, bonus time! Rock-Paper-Scissors!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Rock-Paper-Scissors!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Alright, I won!! Trainer, I got two of 'em!
choice_data_list: You won, so I'll give you one
You won, so I'll give you one

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh?…Ah-…okay… I'll take one… thanks.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oh…? Oooooh! Trainer! The beef tendon here, it's cooked in miso and mirin!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It's white miso!! And this one has alot 'a miso tha' goes well with soy sauce! Got no choice but ta try it, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Stall Manager
text_block_list.text: Lil' lady, ya know a lot! Tha's right, we sell Doteyaki! Even though yer an elementary schooler, do ya eat alot of these kinds of snacks?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, Dad eats alot of these kinds of… -wait, who are ya callin' an elementary schooler?!

text_block_list.name: Stall Manager
text_block_list.text: Oh my, yer not in elementary? Pardon me. As an apology, how 'bout I treat ya ta one!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh?! Really? Ah, in tha' case, I'll pay so it's like it's half-price instead, can I get two?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Nnn~, from th' gooey beef tendon a faint sweetness from th' white miso seeps through… irresistable~.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It wasn't a mistake ta buy this! On top of that, gettin' two of 'em. How extravagant!
choice_data_list: …Excuse me, one more order

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hahahaa, just the' right amount of luxury! It's got an authentic flavor ta it, so it'd be a waste not ta eat it!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Next up… yeah, gotta be some takoyaki. Trainer, want some too?
choice_data_list: I don't think I can finish one order…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wanna split one with me then?
I bought an order of Takoyaki, and split it with Tamamo Cross.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …There's alot 'a dough. Is there even any octopus…?
choice_data_list: Seems about right for festival takoyaki
Seems about right for festival takoyaki

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, sounds like Trainer didn't have high expectations for its flavor either.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …I've always wondered about tha'. Why do people buy takoyaki at a festival, even if it ain't from a specialty shop?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It's… probably that. Th' mood in th' air. Th' festival atmosphere makes it tastier.
choice_data_list: Maybe…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Right? But, without tryin' it once, ya'd never understand why anyone would buy somethin' like that…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …same with rewardin' yerself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I finally get it. Why ya'd want to splurge on a reward… partly so ya have something ta look forward ta.
While looking at the night sky, Tamamo Cross spoke softly as if recalling something.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …A while back, those pancakes I ate, I've wanted ta eat 'em again.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Up until now, just regular hotcake mix has been fine but, that cafe's pancakes are my goal now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: My goals have gotten higher! Rewardin' myself, it's raisin' my motivation to aim even higher!
choice_data_list: T-that's true…
T-that's true…

text_block_list.text: I simply wanted her to spoil herself a little more but… to turn that into a reason to aim higher, it's very much like her.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: 'sides, if I don't know what's tasty or good, how can I know what ta get fer my family?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …tha' weddin' anniversary present, I ended up havin' Trainer choose it fer me, after all…
Right, in the end she was overwhelmed by the the atmosphere in the store and forced to retreat. She couldn't decide on the sweets herself.
choice_data_list: Gaining experience is a good thing!
Gaining experience is a good thing!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Right! After this, I'll give "Rewardin' myself" a try! Make sure ya teach me a lot, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, but… I'll pass on that super expensive choco. Something like today, just walkin' and eatin', is jus' right.
choice_data_list: But, you didn't spend very much though?
But, you didn't spend very much though?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Of course! My Osakan soul won't let me pay full price fer anythin'! I won't change my penny-pinchin' ways!
choice_data_list: Yo! Osaka soul!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Got tha' right! Tamamo Cross, having tasted luxury, will take even further strides forward!
